about_the_game:
STARHOME is a single-player, real-time strategy game where your choices shape the future.


After losing your planet, you set out at the head of the survivor's fleet to find a new home for your people. Venture into the boundless reaches of space, where survival demands a careful balance between resource management and combat. In the harsh and unforgiving depths of the cosmos, you'll need to build a self-sufficient fleet within the constraints of limited space, where every resource counts, and every choice is crucial. Navigate the dangers of deep space, upgrade your fleet, and battle a formidable alien species as you seek to unravel the mystery of your origins. In this never-ending quest, survival is a skill, and the universe is your playground.


The destiny of your fleet lies in your hands. Every decision you make not only affects your adversaries but also determines the survival of your crew No two playthroughs are the same—each time, your fleet will explore a new star cluster and encounter distinct challenges. Steer your fleet through the space, creating a unique and evolving journey with your fleet.


In the vast, uncharted expanses of the galaxy, you will encounter enemies crossing your path. As the captain, have you prepared your fleet adequately for defense? Or have you focused on other aspects? The decisions you make are crucial—will you protect your crew by retreating, or will you face the enemy head-on, risking everything? Command your fleet with strategic foresight, as every decision could mean the difference between victory and defeat in the unforgiving depths of space.


Overseeing a sizable crew requires careful coordination and a strong sense of duty. The key to your fleet’s endurance lies in smart resource management and tactical decisions. With limited space and unique capabilities on each vessel, you'll need to distribute supplies and equipment wisely. As you progress, enhance and adapt your ships to meet the demands of increasingly tough encounters. Expand your fleet by bringing in allied ships, boosting your overall strength and flexibility. Challenge yourself to create a powerful fleet that can tackle any obstacle the galaxy presents.


Set out on a grand journey across the space. Meet both friends and adversaries, confront hostile forces, and ensure the safety of your fleet, which is your new home. Gather and utilize precious materials, uncover the secrets of the stellar realms, and build a thriving community aboard your vessels. With opportunities far surpassing any terrestrial imagination, the stars are yours to discover. Seize the moment—climb aboard and embark on your adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 680 / AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-11600KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

short_description: Take command of the fleet of starships that is the home to the remnants of your civilization. Manage the limited space of each spacecraft and find the balance between living space, production, defenses, and weapons. Explore the galaxy as you seek refuge and safety from an overwhelming threat.
